create.desc: Creates boilerplate with the name of 'my-app' in your current directory.

generateComponent.desc: Creates component file with the name of 'home' in the given path, 'generate' keyword can be 'g'

generateService.desc: Creates service file with the name of 'api' in the given path, 'generate' keyword can be 'g'

update.desc: Updates Olum CLI tool on your machine.

dev.desc: Creates development server, must be run from the root of olum app.

build.desc: Builds your Olum app for deployment, must be run from the root of olum app.
